title: sebdude420
author: sebdude420
content: Hey I am running for City Council in Burbank, CA.Give me some crazy campaign ides.Been looking at the Mayor of Miami and Reno for inspirations.

comments.author: maikrothaman
comments.body: Quote from: sebdude420 on May 14, 2022, 04:25:52 AMHey I am running for City Council in Burbank, CA.Give me some crazy campaign ides.Been looking at the Mayor of Miami and Reno for inspirations.Make Bitcoin the default currency of Miami.

comments.author: Foxpup
comments.body: Quote from: maikrothaman on May 15, 2022, 03:03:29 AMMake Bitcoin the default currency of Miami.Quote from: sebdude420 on May 14, 2022, 04:25:52 AMHey I am running for City Council in Burbank, CA.At the risk of sounding insufficiently crazy, I think public libraries could use extra funding for adult literacy programs.

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: Quote from: sebdude420 on May 14, 2022, 04:25:52 AMHey I am running for City Council in Burbank, CA.What sort of powers does a city council member have? My guess is very little to cause significant change. California would need a complete overhaul if it wanted to fix the homeless crisis, drug problems, high taxes, and all the rest. One can try, I guess. You have more optimism than me, Godspeed.
